post_detail.title: Click 3X Broadcast & Entertainment
post_detail.description: You can do anything with a big idea and some enthusiasm, but having high-end design, animation and visual effects doesn't hurt. Add them both together and you get Click 3X Entertainment, a full-service creative group specializing in on-air promotion, branding and sales marketing all the way from strategic concept development through final execution of on-air, off-air and online elements. Our Entertainment team works with a broad spectrum of entertainment clients including production companies, networks and direct-to-client brands.
